text: "One Man Army" is a 1999 alternative rock song by the Canadian alternative rock band Our Lady Peace. It is the first single from their third studio album, Happiness...Is Not a Fish That You Can Catch, which was released in 1999. The song was written by Raine Maida and was produced by Arnold Lanni. The song is sometimes mistakenly called "Falling". ==Meaning of the song== Category:Our Lady Peace songs Category:1999 songs
title: One Man Army (song)
